Annexure 4 :  Pelvic/Vaginal Examination
Steps
1 Keep the following equipment ready:
 ∙ Sterile/surgical gloves
 ∙ Apron
 ∙ Boiled and cooled/sterile swabs in Dettol
 ∙ 0.5% chlorine solution for decontamination
2 Ask women to pass urine and lie down with her knees flexed and legs apart.
3 Cover her to maintain privacy and then uncover the genital areas.
4 Wash your hands with soap and water and wear sterile gloves.
5 Check the vulva for the presence of:
 ∙ Mucus discharge
